query: SELECT DISTINCT e.userId, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_enrollments WHERE userId = e.userId AND bundleId IS NOT NULL) as bundle_count FROM course_enrollments e WHERE e.courseId IS NOT NULL;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute SELECT DISTINCT e.userId, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_enrollments WHERE userId = e.userId AND bundleId IS NOT NULL) as bundle_count FROM course_enrollments e WHERE e.courseId IS NOT NULL;
